io.spine.server.route

Interface Route<M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,C extends com.google.protobuf.Message,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of messages to get IDs from
    C - the type of message context
    R - the type of the route function result
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommandRoute<I,M>, EventRoute<I,M>, Multicast<I,M,C>, RejectionRoute<I,M>, Unicast<I,M,C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandRouting, DefaultCommandRoute, EventRouting, RejectionRouting

    public interface Route<M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,C extends com.google.protobuf.Message,R>
extends java.io.Serializable
    Obtains one or more entity identifiers based on a message and its context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R apply(M message, C context)
      Obtains a set of entity IDs based on the passed event or command message and its context.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        R apply(M message,
        C context)
        Obtains a set of entity IDs based on the passed event or command message and its context.
        Parameters:
        message - an event or a command message
        context - either EventContext or CommandContext instance
        Returns:
        a set of entity identifiers
